name: Galeb Duhr
speed: 15 ft. (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

abilities.name: Rolling Charge.
abilities.description: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
